verbose_text: However, CXCR3 knockdown by si-CXCR3-1 and si-CXCR3-2 could abolish the reduction of MFN1 and induction of DRP1 and FIS1 in MCD medium treated AML-12 and palmitic acid treated HepG2 hepatocytes, paralleled with ameliorated lipid peroxide levels.
evidence: CXCR3 knockdown by si-CXCR3-1 and si-CXCR3-2 could abolish the reduction of MFN1
